title: Robin

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A mountain hobgoblin, recently come in search of the legendary Orb. Not foolhardy or reckless enough to delve into the depths of the Dungeon alone, Robin has built a small army of minions. Potential competitors will quickly find a stream of screaming goblins flying toward them! |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Location](#Location)
- [3 Spells](#Spells)
- [4 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [5 Trivia](#Trivia)
- [6 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Robin** is a [unique](/Unique "Unique") [hobgoblin](/Hobgoblin "Hobgoblin") who wanders the early floors of the dungeon, accompanied by a massive band of [goblin](/Goblin "Goblin") and [hobgoblin](/Hobgoblin "Hobgoblin") followers. Although none of them are particularly powerful individually, Robin will hurl their goblins at you, swarming you with opponents who can then be inspired, allowing them to deal significant amounts of damage. Robin always spawns with a [helmet](/Helmet "Helmet") and an [animal skin](/Animal_skin "Animal skin").

## Location

- [Dungeon](/Dungeon "Dungeon"):2-4

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                        |                                                      |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Battlecry](/Battlecry "Battlecry")    | [Vocal flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")   |
| Slot2       | [Throw Ally](/Throw_Ally "Throw Ally") | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Robin alone isn't a big threat - it's being surrounded by [mighted](/Might "Might") goblins that's lethal. If you can lure Robin around a corner or use a dead end to restrict the number of enemies that can reach you at once, you can avoid an embarrassing gobliny death. [Stair dancing](/Stair_dancing "Stair dancing") can be used to split the pack.
- Robin's band does not have [herd](/Category:Herd_flag "Category:Herd flag") behavior, so they'll separate over time. If the goblins are awake, you can [wait](/Wait "Wait") a couple hundred turns, preferably on top of a [staircase](/Stair "Stair")). This causes most of the pack to wander off. From there, you can lure one or two monsters at a time, slowly pruning them out.
- If you see a mass of goblins and hobgoblins, this unique is most likely around.

## Trivia

Robin is able to throw [Ijyb](/Ijyb "Ijyb").

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), Robin's base damage was 5.
- Prior to [0.24](/0.24 "0.24"), Robin was considered female.
- Robin was added in [0.16](/0.16 "0.16").

Robin

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Robin g 
HP 10-22
HD 2
XP 15
Speed 10
AC 3
EV 8
Will 10
Attack1 2 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type goblin, hobgoblin
Flags Speaks
Warm-blooded
Unique
Gender neutral
A mountain hobgoblin, recently come in search of the legendary Orb. Not foolhardy or reckless enough to delve into the depths of the Dungeon alone, Robin has built a small army of minions. Potential competitors will quickly find a stream of screaming goblins flying toward them!

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Spells
  • 4 Tips & Tricks
  • 5 Trivia
  • 6 History

Useful Info

Robin is a unique hobgoblin who wanders the early floors of the dungeon, accompanied by a massive band of goblin and hobgoblin followers. Although none of them are particularly powerful individually, Robin will hurl their goblins at you, swarming you with opponents who can then be inspired, allowing them to deal significant amounts of damage. Robin always spawns with a helmet and an animal skin.

Location

  • Dungeon:2-4

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Battlecry Vocal flag
Slot2 Throw Ally Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Robin alone isn't a big threat - it's being surrounded by mighted goblins that's lethal. If you can lure Robin around a corner or use a dead end to restrict the number of enemies that can reach you at once, you can avoid an embarrassing gobliny death. Stair dancing can be used to split the pack.
  • Robin's band does not have herd behavior, so they'll separate over time. If the goblins are awake, you can wait a couple hundred turns, preferably on top of a staircase). This causes most of the pack to wander off. From there, you can lure one or two monsters at a time, slowly pruning them out.
  • If you see a mass of goblins and hobgoblins, this unique is most likely around.

Trivia

Robin is able to throw Ijyb.

History

  • Prior to 0.28, Robin's base damage was 5.
  • Prior to 0.24, Robin was considered female.
  • Robin was added in 0.16.

{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Robin''' is a [[unique]] [[hobgoblin]] who wanders the early floors of the dungeon, accompanied by a massive band of [[goblin]] and [[hobgoblin]] followers. Although none of them are particularly powerful individually, Robin will hurl their goblins at you, swarming you with opponents who can then be inspired, allowing them to deal significant amounts of damage. Robin always spawns with a [[helmet]] and an [[animal skin]].

==Location==
*[[Dungeon]]:2-4

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Robin alone isn't a big threat - it's being surrounded by [[might]]ed goblins that's lethal. If you can lure Robin around a corner or use a dead end to restrict the number of enemies that can reach you at once, you can avoid an embarrassing gobliny death. [[Stair dancing]] can be used to split the pack.
*Robin's band does not have [[:Category:Herd_flag|herd]] behavior, so they'll separate over time. If the goblins are awake, you can [[wait]] a couple hundred turns, preferably on top of a [[stair]]case). This causes most of the pack to wander off. From there, you can lure one or two monsters at a time, slowly pruning them out.
*If you see a mass of goblins and hobgoblins, this unique is most likely around.

==Trivia==
Robin is able to throw [[Ijyb]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.28]], Robin's base damage was 5.
*Prior to [[0.24]], Robin was considered female.
*Robin was added in [[0.16]].
